name: Planet Plutonium Putt-Putt
description:
WELCOME TO PLANET PLUTONIUM

Please enjoy the course's amenities, including its many mutagenic pools and gases!

Look around our scenic environment with mouse.

To hit your ball, left-click and drag with your mouse up and down to control your strike power.

Release the mouse button to hit the ball.

Mutations are either passive or active. Passive mutations wear off after a few strokes; Active mutations wear off after you use them a few times. View information about your new found powers in the inspection screen (TAB or ESC, mouse-over icons for tooltips).

===

Note: Due to browser security limitations around mouse-lock, camera/controls in browser version are a bit touchy. Adjust mouse sensitivity in the options menu, or try the standalone version.

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare Discord Jam #5
